item.title: ::rank forced text error
item.dc:creator: @Josephx Josephx
item.description:
@Josephx wrote:

Hey, I was changing ::rank command for owner’s forced text to say something more… eumm… “Bold” And it gives error in the compiler

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:603: error: unclosed string liter
al
c.forcedText = "IM GAHWD FUCKERS
!!;
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

This is what I have for java of it

I dont know what’s wrong I only changes the text in " " so… ya

if(c.playerRights == 3) {
c.gfx0(1555);
c.forcedText = "IM GAHWD FUCKERS!!;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“OWNER”);
}

Read full topic
